item.title: Jagex is going to add real world trading....?
item.dc:creator: @FeelThaMusiq FeelThaMusiq
item.description:
@FeelThaMusiq wrote:

Frell:

Im worried Jagex may be switching to a microtransaction item shop game model rather than being subscription based…

eczema3:

you could just stop playing such a shit game

Im worried about playn legit…

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex is going to add real world trading....?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

I really doubt they’d go down that path. Jagex has done some drastic things but I don’t think they’ll do something like this.

IF they do something like this, I can almost guarantee the items will not be tradeable. They’ll be untradeable things that will give you an upper hand in the game, but not something like selling gold.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex is going to add real world trading....?

item.title: Jagex is going to add real world trading....?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Frell:

Im worried Jagex may be switching to a microtransaction item shop game model rather than being subscription based…

I sure hope not…I was just about to start enjoying the old runescape, if they start letting us by items then why would anyone ever work in the game to get items. Its easier to make 7 dollars in an hour and buy 14 million GP than it is to make 14 million GP in an hour.

Read full topic
